title: The Quarry Review (Spoiler Free!) - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
Go to  http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your first order or 25% off your first Membership item.

Go to http://chime.com/kfgames to get started with Chime.

Greg, Bless, Joey, and Mike come together to share their thoughts on Supermassive's new horror title The Quarry!

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
